title: Ticket #6278: startd ad has stale rollup information in childOwner, etc. attributes
description:
A partitionable slot has information in attributes with array values, with one entry per active slot. For example, a partitionable slot running three jobs in dynamic slots under it might have an attribute like

RemoteOwner = { "user1", "user2", "user1"}

However, after a job exits, the attribute in the startd ad can be incorrectly updated to be something like

RemoteOwner = { undefined, "user2", "user"}
creator: gthain
